title: A question about MMR.
body:
Hi all,

Just a quick couple of questions about MMR. Ive noticed my MMR dropping on op.gg now ive been promoted to B4. I admit, ive had some terrible games over the past 20 games on my op.gg profile, but such a drastic shift from around 1.1k to under 900 seems a bit unfair.

So my questions are, how does MMR work and what factors are calculated into it?

Cheers,

Syn
